FuncDef: This command converts a normal (unprotected) Python script file into an SRPY format with specified key.
CLIs: python-script protect input <file-url> hmac-sha256 key <secret-key> output <file-url>

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the URL of the input script file.
Specifies the key used to compute the hash.
Specifies the URL of the output script file.
